body: I agree that we could use some more of these.  Here's the set of all the separating components that we have now: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/-FxrWMrAPzhTxax4EHrYDalQ1Ru*BFDkwHtvJ9ALtXHjFDsWMkwqdxJuzwAF64db60tZp1sG7kEbGb6q9efAbAi*5DrBWjGZ/SeparateComponents.JPG) Let us know which ones we should add.  Conditioned/Unconditioned sounds like a good one. -chris
